items.headline: This course reviews the core concepts of the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA).
objectives_summary: Recognize the basic concepts of the FCPA and identify when FCPA issues may arise.
Identify who is and who is not a “government official” under the law.
Identify the types of corruption and bribery that the law is attempting to prohibit.
